channel.title: Repetitive music
channel.description:
I got REALLY bored and saw some a video of the "Ozzy Osbourne - Crazy Train" intro done with redstone and music boxes, thought it was really neat so I decided to figure out how it works (making it play by itself, instead of using pressure plates), and well I came up with a rather neat "song" (like 4 seconds long atm, but it re-plays by itself :)). Anyways, without further adew, I bring you, My song. Please, if your not going to appreciate research I did (actually just the fucking around I did) and possibly learn from it, don't say anything at all. I guess that's just another way of saying what alot of people have been told, "If you don't have anything nice to say, don't say anything at all".
Video: *video comming in a lil while*
Download: http://up.ht/huJwP0

item.title: Repetitive music
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:3, topic:386824”][quote author=xryz link=topic=482593.msg3534379#msg3534379 date=1300453154]
very nice. i would like to do something like this

this is pretty cool: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RuWW9bEfzvs&NR=1&feature=fvwp
[/quote]
Saw that a week ago, I still wanna know how he has it cycling ob a lever though.

Actally, I think I know how its done. Ill develope a switch onto my song later.[/quote]
cool i want to start doing stuff like this

Read full topic
